tr: the social force that binds you to the courses of action demanded by that force
every possession, a duty"- John D.Rockefeller Jr
example: we must instill a sense of duty in our children

tr: a legal agreement specifying a payment or action and the penalty for failure to comply
a written promise to repay a debt
a personal relation in which one is indebted for a service or favor
the state of being obligated to do or pay something
example: he is under an obligation to finish the job

data.enText: the state of being forced to do sth because it is your duty, or because of a law, etc.
You are under no obligation to buy anything.
data.chText: 你不必非买什么东西不可。

data.enText: She did not feel under any obligation to tell him the truth.
data.chText: 她觉得没有义务告诉他实情。

data.enText: I don't want people coming to see me out of a sense of obligation .
data.chText: 我不想让别人迫于无奈来看我。

data.enText: We will send you an estimate for the work without obligation (= you do not have to accept it) .
data.chText: 我们将寄上工程估算，仅供参考。

data.enText: something which you must do because you have promised, because of a law, etc.
data.chText: （已承诺的或法律等规定的）义务，责任
履行法律 / 职业 / 财务责任

data.enText: They reminded him of his contractual obligations.
data.chText: 他们提醒他注意合同规定的义务。

data.enText: We have a moral obligation to protect the environment.
data.chText: 我们有道义责任保护环境。

simple_means.memory_skill: obligate 强迫,迫使 + -ion 行为,状态

means: (已承诺的或法律等规定的)义务

ex.enText: Employees are under no obligation to buy any products from their own company.
ex.chText: 员工没有义务购买本公司生产的产品。

ex.enText: They have to fulfil the obligations imposed on them by the treaties.
ex.chText: 他们不得不履行条约规定的义务。

ex.enText: He kept the secret for her out of a sense of obligation.
ex.chText: 他出于责任感而替她保守秘密。

ex.enText: In fact, greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.
ex.chText: 事实上，履行这些义务需要更多的财力。

synonyms.bx: 指法规、合同等规定的该做或不该做的事，含强制之意；也指因诺言、誓言等而必须要做的事。

ex.enText: The company made a commitment to quality.
ex.chText: 该公司对质量作出承诺。

ex.enText: 88 percent of respondents said marriage should be a lifelong commit-ment.
ex.chText: 88%的受访者表示婚姻应该是一辈子的承诺。

ex.enText: She's got a lot of commitments.

synonyms.bx: 指会去做某事的保证或保证去做的事情。

ex.enText: He feels it is his duty to help his neighbors.
ex.chText: 他觉得帮助邻居是他的责任。

ex.enText: She was brought up to have a strong sense of moral duty.
ex.chText: 她从小就被教育要有强烈的道德责任感。

ex.enText: Never forget your duty to your motherland.
ex.chText: 切勿忘记你对祖国应尽的义务。

ex.enText: His duties included sweeping the lawn.
ex.chText: 他的职责包括清理草坪。

synonyms.bx: 指在道义或法律上应尽的本分，强调自觉性；也指工作职责，此时通常用复数。

ex.enText: Are you ready to perform your functions in your new job?
ex.chText: 你准备好在新的工作岗位上履行职责了吗？

ex.enText: What's the function of this newly founded department?
ex.chText: 这个新成立的部门的职能是什么？

synonyms.bx: 指某人的工作职责或某事物的职能或功用。

ex.enText: Generally speaking, a promotion means higher salary and more responsibility.
ex.chText: 一般而言，升职意味着更多的薪水和更大的责任。

ex.enText: It's your responsibility to inform them of any changes.
ex.chText: 如有任何变动，你有责任通知他们。

ex.enText: Who should accept full responsibility for the political crisis?
ex.chText: 谁应该为这场政治危机负全责？

ex.enText: Her responsibilities include handing out brochures and answering the phone.
ex.chText: 她的职责包括分发宣传册和接听电话。

synonyms.bx: 指管控某人或某事物的责任、对不良事件所负的责任或工作职责，强调对他人的责任。

example.ex: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it...
example.tran: 老师布置作业时，学生通常认为完成作业是一种义务。

example.ex: Ministers are under no obligation to follow the committee's recommendations.
example.tran: 部长不必非得听从委员会的建议。

value.def: If you have an obligation to do something, it is your duty to do that thing.

example.ex: The United States will do that which is necessary to meet its obligations to its own citizens...
example.tran: 美国将为自己的公民尽其应尽的义务。

example.ex: I have an ethical and a moral obligation to my client.
example.tran: 我对我的当事人负有道义上的责任。

value.def: If you have an obligation to a person, it is your duty to look after them or protect their interests.
value.tran: (照顾某人或保护某人利益的)义务，责任

example.ex: If you are selling your property, why not call us for a free valuation without obligation?...
example.tran: 如果您打算出售房产，何不打电话让我们作免费估价呢？

example.ex: You can review your policy in detail for a full 15 days without obligation.
example.tran: 您可以在15天的免费体验期内仔细审核保单细则。

value.def: In advertisements, if a product or a service is available without obligation, you do not have to pay for that product or service until you have tried it and are satisfied with it.
value.tran: (广告中产品或服务)免费试用地，免费体验地

trans: 无义务；有免费；无责任；没有义务
道义责任；道义上的责任
法定义务；法律上的义务
合同义务；约定义务；契约责任；合同债务；契约债务
(广告中产品或服务)免费试用地，免费体验地
